breakingNews.title: New WPRK spaces available for everyone
breakingNews.author: Isabella Simonetti
breakingNews.content: Our lobby is a place where all music lovers and creatives come together and hangout throughout the day! Make sure to stop by and visit us!

breakingNews.title: BYD Is Taking Electric Vehicles To The World!
breakingNews.author: Remeredzai Joseph Kuhudzai
breakingNews.content: There was quite a bit of drama on several forums following reports in various media platforms around the world that BYD has overtaken Telsa to become the top-selling EV company. In fact, there was quite a bit of an uproar from some circles that felt that it was a mistake.

breakingNews.title: Unexpected storms diverted 100 American Airlines flights and sparked hundreds of cancellations
breakingNews.author: Marnie Hunter
breakingNews.content: Severe thunderstorms around Dallas-Fort Worth International Airport on Wednesday caused 100 American Airlines flight diversions and led to hundreds of cancellations that extended into Thursday's schedule.

recentNews.title: Teens have abandoned Facebook, Pew study says
recentNews.author: Amanda Silberling
recentNews.content: Gen Z internet use is on the rise, but the rate at which teens use Facebook is rapidly declining. A Pew Research Center study on teens, technology and social media found that only 32% of teens aged use Facebook.

recentNews.title: Fox-owned Tubi expands its free streaming service to five Latin American countries
recentNews.author: Lauren Forristal
recentNews.content: Tubi, the free ad-supported streaming service owned by Fox, is now available in Costa Rica, Ecuador, El Salvador, Guatemala, and Panama. This expansion has doubled its global footprint and signals the company's interest in capturing more Latin American viewers.

recentNews.title: Massive iron batteries could be key to displacing natural gas from the grid
recentNews.author: Tim De Chant
recentNews.content: VoltStorage recently raised a Series C worth $24 million from engine manufacturer Cummins. Its previous rounds included investments from SOSV and EIT InnoEnergy.

recentNews.title: Mark Cuban, Mavericks in hot water over Voyager "Ponzi scheme"
recentNews.author: Anita Ramaswamy
recentNews.content: The class-action lawsuit alleges that Cuban's promotion of now-bankrupt crypto firm Voyager cost investors $5 billion.
